sentences.english: This is the second state visit to France by President Hu Jintao in the six years.
sentences.chinese: 這是時隔6年多後，胡錦濤再次對法國進行國事訪問。

sentences.english: The Prime Minister is on a three-day state visit to the US.
sentences.chinese: 目前，莫迪總理正在對美國進行爲期三天的國事訪問。

sentences.english: I am worried about people's life and the state affairs all day.
sentences.chinese: 我勤政愛民，整天爲國事，爲百姓的生活擔心憂慮。

sentences.english: So the Estonian side is very glad at President Jiang's state visit to Estonia.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我們非常高興江主席來愛沙尼亞進行國事訪問。

sentences.english: Supporting China's feudal dynasty monarch known as the highest official in charge of the state.
sentences.chinese: 我國封建王朝輔助君主掌管國事的最高官員的通稱。

sentences.english: Lu, all went to watch for this state is slack.
sentences.chinese: 魯國君臣整日前去觀看，對國事就懈怠了。

sentences.english: Recently, Than Shwe concluded a five-day state visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 最近，丹瑞結束對中國爲期五天的國事訪問。

sentences.english: We are also busily preparing the state visit by Indian President to China.
sentences.chinese: 我們也在積極籌備印度總統對中國的國事訪問。

sentences.english: President Hu had a successful state visit to the United States in January.
sentences.chinese: 胡主席在一月份對美國進行了一次成功的國事訪問。

sentences.english: This week, President Obama makes his first state visit to China.
sentences.chinese: 奧巴馬總統即將在本週對中國進行首次國事訪問。

sentences.english: It was the first state visit in English history.
sentences.chinese: 這是英格蘭歷史上的首次國事訪問。

sentences.english: I was deeply touched by their interest in national affairs.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得他們對國事的關心，深深感動了我。

sentences.english: Representatives of different nationalities gather in the same hall to discuss affairs of state.
sentences.chinese: 各族人民的代表聚集一堂，共商國事。

sentences.english: In England, the sovereign reigns but does not rule.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，君主是國家元首，但不治理國事。

sentences.english: This is the first state visit to Kenya by President Hu.
sentences.chinese: 這是胡錦濤主席首次對肯尼亞進行國事訪問。

sentences.english: Cosgrove has been in China since last week on his first state visit.
sentences.chinese: 上週，科斯格羅夫來華進行首次國事訪問。

definition: strict/serious/solemn/dignified/to tidy up/to clean up/to purge/to adjust
to take turns/to work by roster
variant of 勸誡|劝诫[quan4 jie4]
see 念念不忘[nian4 nian4 bu4 wang4]
to bend to a task and spare no effort (idiom); striving to the utmost
the hardships of beginning an undertaking (idiom)
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
Xiao He (-193 BC), famous strategist and chancellor, fought on Liu Bang's 劉邦|刘邦[Liu2 Bang1] side during the Chu-Han Contention 楚漢戰爭|楚汉战争[Chu3 Han4 Zhan4 zheng1]
tossed about by the wind and rain (idiom)/(of a situation) unstable
